thread.title: Three suspects arrested for possession of stolen property
thread.title_full: Three suspects arrested for possession of stolen property | News24

author: news24.com
title: Three suspects arrested for possession of stolen property
text:
Johannesburg – Three suspect allegedly involved in theft out of motor vehicle and possession of stolen property were arrested in Johannesburg on Thursday, police said.
According to a statement issued by the Johannesburg Central Police, two suspects were caught on closed circuit television (CCTV) cameras while offloading boxes containing jeans from a stationary bakkie.
The alleged suspects were between the ages of 29 and 49.
“Suspects loaded boxes inside a trolley and gave a security guard one box of jeans,” the statement read.
One suspect was caught at the corner Bree and Quinn Streets and his partner ran away. The boxes were recovered.
